params.812: Reach level 5 in the Mining skill.
params.813: You can find rocks to mine by looking at the Mini-map and World map for the icon <img=17>. You can get a pickaxe from the Mining Tutor, south of Lumbridge graveyard.
params.814: You can find rocks to mine by looking at the Mini-map and World map for the icon <img=17>.|You can get a pickaxe from the Mining Tutor, south of Lumbridge graveyard.|At level 1 Mining you can mine Copper ore and Tin ore, there are some rocks by the mining tutor.|The higher your Mining level, the more varieties of rocks you can mine.
params.823: This is what the Mining tutor looks like.
params.936: A hint arrow has been added above a rock you can mine.
params.938: A hint arrow has been placed near some ore rocks. The ore should respawn shortly.
